title: Lynda - AngularJS: Building a Data-Driven App
description:
Lynda - AngularJS: Building a Data-Driven App

This Course will be good to the Best for DL within 30 days after has been post, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

2h 9m Intermediate Nov 24, 2015 | Uploaded in Nov 28, 2015 by 2boweb
Subject: Web 
Software: Node.js AngularJS 
Author: Ray Villalobos 
 
Want to create data-driven web applications? AngularJS is a great choice. With these tutorials, you'll learn to build apps that allow multiple users to push and pull data at the same time, in real time. Ray Villalobos starts the course where AngularJS: Adding Registration to Your Application left off: a simple application that checks users in and out of meetings. Ray then shows you how to enhance the existing app with new views and controllers and reward random checked-in users with prizes.â€¨â€¨Although it's easy to learn, AngularJS can be hard to master. With these project-based lessons, you'll learn how the framework works in the real world, and see how data-driven programming can help your apps react to real-time data streams.
Topics include:
	â€¢	Creating a new view
	â€¢	Adding, showing, and deleting database records
	â€¢	Using events to track meetings
	â€¢	Adding a form to the app
	â€¢	Creating methods
	â€¢	Controlling views with classes
